TFTPSend.DirectFile
TFTPSend     

property DirectFile: Boolean;

Unit
FTPsend

Description
Mode of datahandling by data connection. If False, all data operations is made to or from DataStream TMemoryStream.

If true, data operations is made directly to file in your disk. (filename is specified by DirectFileMame property)

Dafault is False!


See also:
AppendFile, DataStream, DirectFileName, List, RetriveFile, StoreFile, StoreUniqueFile
